biotools.summary: Virtual Microdissection for SNP calling. Variant caller designed for disease-control matched samples. It is also specialized for identifying potential within individual contamination where the disease sample cannot be purified enough. It can uncover SNPs with low allele frequency by considering the level of contamination (alpha).

bioschemas.name: Virmid
